page.title: 11Kettering's Caravan Centre
page.content: Caravanning in the 80's is extremely popular and has become big business. Sited at Windy Ridge just off Warkton Lane and almost hidden to general view is Kestral Caravan Centre and Peak's Storage Park. There is a most attractive camp site for up to 30 caravans with the usual facilities and children's swings. An accessory shop caters for the needs of the caravanner and a hire fleet of 20 caravans is available. These are used extensively and especially for the Silverstone Grand Prix and Burleigh Horse Trials. A gravel surfaced storage area accommodates 410 caravans and the demand is such that 100 more places could be utilised. At any one time there are around 30 caravans for sale either at Windy Ridge or the town centre sales area.
